ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

ElementDescription: Sex of subject at birth
Notes: M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: The event name for which the data was collected
Race Ethnicity (Child)

Family ID (participants belonging to the same family share a family ID). The family ID is autocalculated and will change after the addition/removal of subjects from the ABCD study. Family IDs will, therefore, differ between data releases
Group ID (twins and triplets in the same family share a group ID)
In-Group Order ID (twins and triplets in the same family and in the same group have different values)
Relationship of the participant in his or her family
Same sex twin

Imputed raked propensity weight. The raked propensity weight merges the ACS and ABCD data (with missing data imputed), estimates the propensity model, computes and scales/trims the propensity weights and finally rakes the scaled weights to final ACS control totals by age, sex and race/ethnicity.
genetic related with participant based on genetic_pi_hat_4
Probability of identity by descend between participant and genetic_paired_subjectid_1
Probability of identity by descend between participant and genetic_paired_subjectid_2
Probability of identity by descend between participant and genetic_paired_subjectid_3
Probability of identity by descend between participant and genetic_paired_subjectid_4
Genetically inferred zygosity status between participant and genetic_paired_subjectid_1
Notes: 1= monozygotic ; 2= dizygotic ; 3=siblings ;-1= not available (twins/sibs, genetic_pi_hat not calculated)

ElementDescription: Genetically inferred zygosity status between participant and genetic_paired_subjectid_2
Notes: 1= monozygotic ; 2= dizygotic ; 3=siblings ;-1= not available (twins/sibs, genetic_pi_hat not calculated)

ElementDescription: Genetically inferred zygosity status between participant and genetic_paired_subjectid_3
Notes: 1= monozygotic ; 2= dizygotic ; 3=siblings ;-1= not available (twins/sibs, genetic_pi_hat not calculated)

ElementDescription: Genetically inferred zygosity status between participant and genetic_paired_subjectid_4
Notes: 1= monozygotic ; 2= dizygotic ; 3=siblings ;-1= not available (twins/sibs, genetic_pi_hat not calculated)

ElementDescription: Proportion of African ancestry
Proportion of European ancestry
Proportion of East Asian ancestry
Proportion of American ancestry
